    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • printMonth

        public static void printMonth(int year,
                              int month)
        Displays the calendar for the specified month in the specified year.

        If the first argument is less than 1 or the second argument is invalid, nothing is displayed.

        Parameters:
        year - the year
        month - the month

      • printMonthTitle

        public static void printMonthTitle(int year,
                                   int month)
        Displays the month, year, and the names of the days of the week.

        If the first argument is less than 1 or the second argument is invalid, nothing is displayed.

        Parameters:
        year - the year
        month - the month

      • getMonthName

        public static java.lang.String getMonthName(int month)
        Returns the name for the month.

        If the integer argument is invalid, no month name is returned.

        Parameters:
        month - the month
        Returns:
        the name of the month

      • printMonthBody

        public static void printMonthBody(int year,
                                  int month)
        Displays the days of the specified month in the specified year.

        If the first argument is less than 1 or the second argument is invalid, no days are displayed.

        Parameters:
        year - the year
        month - the month

      • getStartDay

        public static int getStartDay(int year,
                              int month)
        Returns the day of the week of the first day of the specified month and year using Zeller's congruence.

        If the first argument is less than 1 or the second argument is invalid, the day of the week will default to -1.

        Parameters:
        year - the year
        month - the month
        Returns:
        the day of the week

      • getTotalNumberOfDays

        public static int getTotalNumberOfDays(int year,
                                       int month)
        Returns the total number of days since January 1, 1 to the specified month and year.

        If the first argument is less than 1 or the second argument is invalid, the total number of days will default to 0.

        Parameters:
        year - the year
        month - the month
        Returns:
        the total number of days

      • getNumberOfDaysInMonth

        public static int getNumberOfDaysInMonth(int year,
                                         int month)
        Returns the number of days in the specified month.

        If the first argument is less than 1 or the second argument is invalid, the number of days will default to 0.

        Parameters:
        year - the year
        month - the month
        Returns:
        the number of days in the month

      • isLeapYear

        public static boolean isLeapYear(int year)
        Returns if the year is a leap year.

        If the integer argument is less than 1, it will default to be not a leap year.

        Parameters:
        year - the year
        Returns:
        true if the year is a leap year. Otherwise, false.
